name: emscripten_test1
description: just for fun, need use some c++ libs in wasm on project at work

scripts.emc: emcc -O3 main.cpp -o main.js -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=[_read,_fill,_getTriangeSize,_getVertexSize,_malloc,_simplify_mesh,_free] -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB  -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=ccall,cwrap
scripts.emc-m: emcc -O3 main.cpp -o main.mjs -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=[_read,_fill,_getTriangeSize,_getVertexSize,_malloc,_simplify_mesh,_free] -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH -s MAXIMUM_MEMORY=4GB  -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=ccall,cwrap
